description:
Learn how to start a blog the right way!

Blog promotion is one of the biggest things that bloggers struggle with, but blogging doesn't have to be hard! This course compiles a few of the most effective techniques that I have used to promote Small Business Ideas Blog and get thousands of social shares to some posts.

The goal for this course is not to overwhelm people with every blog marketing technique out there, but instead to focus on the highest ROI techniques that influential bloggers are using today to quickly build a massive following. As a beginner, you need to be able to know how to promote your blog as quickly and effectively as possible.

Some concepts discussed include:

  • Blog Setup - How to get a professional blog set up quickly and inexpensively
  • Social Media - Where to focus your efforts on social media & a few common pitfalls that cause bloggers to fail
  • SEO for blogging - Why SEO is much easier than most bloggers think and how to get ongoing traffic from the search engines
  • Outreach - How to connect and collaborate with other bloggers to scale your reach, even when you are just getting started
  • Guest Blogging - Is guest blogging dead? How to get featured on popular blogs and what to avoid when guest posting

I also briefly go over some less common techniques that other A-list bloggers are using and my thoughts on them. The contents of this course are based on my own blogging experiences as well as a careful study of other highly successful blogs.
title: How to Start a Blog: Blogging & Promotion Tips for Beginners
